p.s: The political speech of Barack Obama Remarks of president Barack Obama at student roundtable which was hold in Istanbul on the 7th April 2009 is about the importance of student exchanges and the pursuit to prosperity from young people.
Also, the text is an apellappeal to young people and is divided into 5 paragraphs.
At the beginning Obama immediately says that the reason he came to turkeyTurkey is because he is interested to rebuild the relationship between the US and the Muslim world (l. 1-2).
This shows his opennesopenness to different countries, but also his coorperativecooperative mindset.
After that Obama mentions his pride of the young people in America for example for teaching in their school or volunteering abroad (l. 4-5).
He also says that he sees young, passionate, engaged but also informed people all around the world (ll. 7-8).
For this reason Obama wants to connect young Americans to young people all around the world (ll. 9-10).
Simple exchanges can break down walls between us, for when people come together and speak to one another and share a common experience, then their common humanity is revealed(l. 13-14).
This again underlines how important it is for Obama to connect people around the world.
In the following text he appellsappeals again to young people to always work hard (l. 18-20).
In the last sentence Obama says if you are in endeavor, you will always find a supporter in the US.
This shows that he describes the US as a helpful country.
All in all is the text well structured and informative.
It also can help people who are unsure to do a student exchange in the US.
